meanings.definition: A native or inhabitant of Afghanistan.
meanings.sent1: The afghani greeted us warmly at the market.
meanings.sent2: Many afghani people wear traditional clothing.
meanings.sent3: The afghani told a funny joke at the gathering.
meanings.sent4: The afghani's love for their country is as deep as the mountains.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the smile of the afghani we met on our trip.

meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Afghanistan.
meanings.sent1: I exchanged my dollars for afghani at the bank.
meanings.sent2: The price was listed in afghani at the store.
meanings.sent3: The afghani in my pocket jingled as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her generosity was worth more than any afghani.
meanings.sent5: The colorful afghani bills brightened up my wallet.
